ygData.subject: Re: word of possession(happy99)
ygData.msgSnippet: In addition, block his e-mail address from your client.  If you don t have a block option, edit your filters to send mail from him to the trash.   I guess the
ygData.messageBody:
In addition, block his e-mail address from your client. If you don't have a
block option, edit your filters to send mail from him to the trash. I
guess the whole Melissa virus didn't teach him anything.


Dalthas





>I thought spreading viruses was a felony? Someone send the cops in the
>direction of the originator of the virus, Mr Richard Kubin
>(rkubin@...). And whatever you do, don't open happy99.exe, it
>contains a virus.
